newsitem.title: USA: Noland Sept sales rise 2.5 pct to $37.4 mln.
newsitem.headline: Noland Sept sales rise 2.5 pct to $37.4 mln.

text.p: Noland Co said Friday its September sales were $37.4 million, 2.5 percent higher than their sales of $36.5 million in September 1995.

The company said the month's results gave the wholesale distribution firm $123.5 million in sales for the third quarter ended September 30. That's 2.3 percent higher than the $120.7 million in sales recorded during 1995's third quarter.
In the first nine months of the year, Noland said its sales were $354.3 million, slightly below the $356 million posted for the first nine months of 1995.
